marklogic.body:
I don't get it, 100 million is more than a reasonable person could ever spend in a life time, so why does the chance to win over a 600 million suck so many people in. What the heck is anyone going to do with all that money?
Depending on your age 10 million would be perfect, you would get about 6 and a half million after taxes, that would give you enough to give a couple million to help family and friends, and live out your life with the rest.
600 plus million, one big Headache!
